title: TRACK LAYOUT detail page Â» IMAGES
user_story:
As a visitor
I want the TRACK LAYOUT detail page to show all connected IMAGES
So I can ...
description:
* The TRACK LAYOUT detail page contains a section with a list of all connected IMAGES.
* Each IMAGE in the list is presented with its name and primary information.
* Each IMAGE in the list contains a link to its detail page.
* Each IMAGE in the list has a thumbnail image.
* When there is no IMAGE connected to the TRACK LAYOUT then the section is not displayed at all.
